alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Forsyth; Hall; Lumpkin (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 4:51PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Forsyth, southwestern Lumpkin, southeastern Dawson and Hall Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 451 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Auraria, or near Dawsonville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, nickel sized hail and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Cumming, Dahlonega, Dawsonville, Buford, Braselton, Flowery Branch, Oakwood, Dougherty, Candler, Coal Mountain, Aqualand Park, Silver City, Chestatee, Murrayville, Chestnut Mountain, Oscarville, Road Atlanta-Lanier Speedway, Auraria and Lake Lanier Islands. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
